title: [Future request] Microsoft remote assistance and/or Remote Control
author: qzem
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
Hello I would like very much if you would implement windows Remote Assistance (msra.exe) and/or Remote Control (the way that it works in System Center Configuration Manager. It offers user help, and user must confirm it to let you see and control his desktop. 

Kind regards
